Class ExportsProcessor

java.lang.Object
codeContext.processors.export.ExportsProcessor
public class ExportsProcessor extends Object
Functionality to extract and process exports

Jakub Perdek

  • Method Details

    • isConstructMarkedAsDirectExport

      public static boolean isConstructMarkedAsDirectExport(org.json.simple.JSONObject codeConstructAst)
      Get information if processed code construct is directly marked as exported -based on AST, empty record (without parameters, arguments, members or body)
      Parameters:
      codeConstructAst - - particular/processed construct in AST
      Returns:
      true if the processed code construct is directly marked as exported otherwise false

    • getDefaultExportFromAst

      public static ExportedObjectInterface getDefaultExportFromAst(org.json.simple.JSONObject astRoot, GlobalContext globalContext, InnerContext localContext)
      Returns the default export from AST (from the root of AST)
      Parameters:
      astRoot - - the root of application AST
      globalContext - - global context - accessible in all places (such as variables declared as var in JavaScript)
      localContext - - inner context - the context known as local context, context inside functions, classes
      Returns:
      default export from AST (from the root of AST)

    • getExportedParts

      private static List<String> getExportedParts(org.json.simple.JSONObject codeConstructAst)
      Extracts export code fragments -declared variables from exported declaration list -direct exports from export clause -export from expression
      Parameters:
      codeConstructAst - - code construct in AST
      Returns:
      The list of exported code fragments/parts

    • analyzeAndExtractsExportedNames

      public static List<String> analyzeAndExtractsExportedNames(org.json.simple.JSONObject codeConstructAst)
      Analyzes and extracts the export names
      Parameters:
      codeConstructAst - - the AST from which the export names are going to be harvested
      Returns:
      the list of extracted export names

    • exportNamesAndFindMapping

      public static void exportNamesAndFindMapping(org.json.simple.JSONObject codeConstructAst, ExportAggregator exportAggregator, InnerContext initialContext, GlobalContext globalContext)
      Extracts the exported names from and harvests mapping between particular context and exported code fragment
      Parameters:
      codeConstructAst - - the AST from which the export names are going to be harvested
      exportAggregator - - aggregator instance to aggregate exports
      initialContext - - the initial/base/root inner context of inner context hierarchy
      globalContext - - global context - accessible in all places (such as variables declared as var in JavaScript)
